title: Split cherry tree
creator_contributor_role: Learning Corporation of America, production company
subject_group: Literature/American literature - Film and video adaptations
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Parent participation
description: Based on a short story by Jesse Stuart about the son of a poor uneducated farming couple who must stay after school to work off a debt incurred by breaking a cherry tree during a biology excursion. This angers and humiliates his father, who sets off for school to teach "that modern professor" a lesson. Instead it is he who learns a lesson: education is important, and his son deserves a chance for a better life. Cast includes Colleen Dewhurst and Will Newman.
